projectGridLines.title: Software Engineer (AI)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Work with our product development team to implement new AI Based solutions and/or enhance existing AI based solutions that:

1.          Generate Test Cases based on unstructured Functional & Technical Requirement documents, JIRA Stories, other backlogs, etc.

2.          Implement Topic Modelling to understand Business domains and perform predictive analytics on Risks, productivity, etc.

3.          Implement AI solutions in Software Test Automation, including but not limited to:

             a.          Auto-generation of automated tests

             b.          Generation of Test Data

             c.          UI discovery of Applications Under Test
